name: Are You Sure You Can Handle That Drill?
name_original: Are You Sure You Can Handle That Drill?
description:
Are You Sure You Can Handle That Drill? is a game in which you figure whether or not you can, infact, handle that drill. Use it to reach for the skies and screw in the God of Screw-kind.

Controls:

  • Hold/Release Left Mouse to Handle the Drill
  • Click Left Mouse Once to Screw
  • R to Restart
  • Escape to Quit

Attributions

  • btherad2000

  • sandyrb
